entry.title: Sunday night: Rain. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening. Rain beginning before morning. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain. High 12.
entry.summary: Rain. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming south 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Showers or drizzle. Low 6.
entry.summary: Showers or drizzle ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Fog patches developing in the evening. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the evening. Low 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Sunday 30 April 2023
